18 import rospy
19 
20 # Messages
21 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import PausePlanExecution
22 from niryo_robot_status.msg import RobotStatus
23 
24 from ..common.abstract_top_button import AbstractTopButton
25 
26 
27 class TopButton(AbstractTopButton):
28 
29  def __init__(self):
30  super(TopButton, self).__init__()
31 
32  self.last_time_button_pressed = rospy.Time.from_sec(0)
33 
34  self.__last_is_prog_running = False
35  self.__button_action_done = False
36 
37  self._robot_status = RobotStatus()
38  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status', RobotStatus, self._callback_robot_status)
39 
40  # Seems to be overkill over that value due to reading IO time
41  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration.from_sec(1.0 / 10), self.check_button)
42 
43  rospy.loginfo("Niryo Button started")
44 
45  def _callback_robot_status(self, msg):
46  self.__robot_status = msg
47  # self._is_prog_running()
48 
49  def _is_prog_running(self):
50  is_prog_running = self.__robot_status.robot_status in [
51  self.__robot_status.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS,
52  self.__robot_status.PAUSE,
53  self.__robot_status.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS,
54  self.__robot_status.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS
55  ]
56 
57  # if self.__last_is_prog_running != is_prog_running:
58  # self.__last_is_prog_running = is_prog_running
59 
60  # if is_prog_running:
61  # self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.PLAY)
62  # else:
63  # self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.STANDBY)
64 
65  return is_prog_running
66 
67  def check_button(self, _event):
68  button_was_pressed = self.is_button_pressed()
69  self.read_value()
70 
71  if self.is_button_pressed():
72  # Get press state
73  if not button_was_pressed:
74  self.__button_action_done = False
75  self.last_time_button_pressed = rospy.Time.now()
76 
77  # Get long press to cancel program
78  if not self.__button_action_done and (rospy.Time.now() - self.last_time_button_pressed).to_sec() > 2:
79  self.__button_action_done = True
80 
81  if self._is_prog_running():
82  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.CANCEL)
83  rospy.logwarn("Button Manager - Cancel sequence")
84  self._cancel_program_from_program_manager()
85 
86  # Was pressed and is not anymore (release)
87  elif not self.__button_action_done and button_was_pressed:
88  elapsed_seconds = (rospy.Time.now() - self.last_time_button_pressed).to_sec()
89 
90  # Check if there is an action to do
91  if 0.02 < elapsed_seconds < 2:
92  self.__button_action_done = True
93  if self._is_prog_running():
94  self._manage_python_program()
95  else:
96  self._trigger_sequence_autorun()
97 
98  def _manage_python_program(self):
99  # Pause the current move
100  if self._pause_state in [PausePlanExecution.PLAY, PausePlanExecution.RESUME]:
101  self._pause_program()
102  elif self._pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
103  self._resume_program()
